attributes.review: I thought Mr. Cheeto dust’s app might have but I was disappointed in what I saw. I did have some faith at first but this app let me down. I really just wanted to see what he was up to but the app is just so bad I can’t handle. The app was just Bad in General and it didn’t work right so no❤️.                     Also vote Kanye west for president 2020😘😘
attributes.title: Horrible app do NOT ✨download ✨

attributes.review: I can’t believe anyone would want trump as our president like really he said we had corona under control but WOULDNT you no we don’t have it under control not to mention he’s increased our national debt is trying to ban one of the most used apps in America and he didn’t even build the wall? Is everything he says a lie??
attributes.title: NOOOOO

attributes.review: trust me i love trump and all but this app stinks it has cause seizures in other peoples familys but my reasoning is far different this app was very glitchy and overall was just very laggy it was so hard to use because every second it made my screen go all over the place my phone had NEVER done ANYTHING like this before DO NOT GET THIS APP!!
attributes.title: LAGGY APP!

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to try and find a reason to vote for such a terrible president. And the moment I downloaded it, a virus went into my phone! I ended up having to pay a TON of money to get them removed! 

SIKE!!! Cuz ur gonna ban TikTok, we’re gonna rise up. Trump, you’re standing against the most powerful generation the world has seen. Peace! 🧚🏻‍♂️✨🌸
attributes.title: Terrible app.

attributes.review: This is a bad app. They ask me so much questions and I feel nervous, and it is always glitching and kicking me out of the app, and I have a normal phone, please change this app a little so it does not glitch, I am sorry that I’m giving one star but this app has always made me nervous.
attributes.title: I’ve never seen a app like this

attributes.review: Trump doesn’t deserve a app over all he’s racist a pig and he’s built a wall over Mexico wow and taking people away from their family’s he also allows cops a protest to shoot people with a rubber bullet and tear gas them that’s harming what we’re trying to fix so I’d say take this app down it’s worthless
attributes.title: Why he doesn’t deserve the app

attributes.review: The app is super terrible. Every time I opened the app, 1 of two things would always happen. The app would drain my battery really fast, or it would shut down. I don’t know what’s wrong with this app, but I do know it is a terrible app and needs to be taken off the App Store.
attributes.title: Don’t get it, this is terrible

attributes.review: It’s just bad, there is not enough useful information. It is all extremely biased and trying to make up your mind for you. We need to have all information and be able to make up our minds that way. Maybe in the redesign you can include all the reports of r*pe and p*dophilia against the president of the US.
attributes.title: Bad app

attributes.review: i opened the app and there was this glitch of an orange man, idk if it was meant to be there or no, and this app made me cringe when i opened it cause it said TRUMP 2020, i would not recommend this app, i’ve heard it’s “attacking” people and we don’t need that, especially with the president we have already. thank you for your time.
attributes.title: 🧚🏻✨horrible✨🧚🏻

attributes.review: Hi I think this app is horrible I was on it and is caused a virus on my phone so I had to reset it so now all of my pictures are gone thanks to this horrible app based on a horrible orange man 🟠 🍊 I never liked this man I downloaded it to see how bad he is turns out he is ps I’m half Spanish so really I don’t like you.🤡+🍊= horrible Donald trump
attributes.title: To stupid orange man and apple
